messages.title: Don't just take our word for it...
messages.content: Quotes from various sources criticizing Boris Johnson.

messages.title: A Liberal Democrat vote can beat Boris Johnson here - and deliver a brighter future:
messages.content: Outlines reasons to vote for Liberal Democrats to prevent a majority for Boris Johnson and addresses environmental policy and NHS support.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Transform the climate by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.

Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Boris Johnson. It is a vote to build a brighter future where we tackle the climate emergency, address inequality, properly fund our NHS and mental health services, and give every child the best start in life.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want to stop Boris Johnson getting a majority, vote Liberal Democrat on 12 December.

issues.education: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote... and give every child the best start in life.
issues.environment: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Boris Johnson. It is a vote to build a brighter future where we tackle the climate emergency... Transform the climate by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.
issues.health: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote... properly fund our NHS and mental health services...
issues.socialWelfare: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Boris Johnson. It is a vote to build a brighter future where we tackle the climate emergency, address inequality...

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Resident, In just a few days' time, you have the chance to decide the future of our country. This General Election is about choosing the kind of country we want to be - whether we are open, fair and inclusive, or closed, selfish and intolerant.

quotes.text: Boris Johnson is not fit to be Prime Minister.

images.caption: Image of Boris Johnson with negative quotes from various figures.
Image of Jo Swinson, Leader of the Liberal Democrats.

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. If you want to stop Boris Johnson getting a majority, vote Liberal Democrat on 12 December.
